abstract: James R Oestreich reviews concert of Rachmaninoff choral works, performed by choir Musica Sacra and conducted by organist Kent Tritle, at Church of St Paul the Apostle.
snippet: The organist Kent Tritle deployed one of his many choruses, Musica Sacra, at the Church of St. Paul the Apostle near Columbus Circle.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Cathedral Church of St John the Divine (NYC)

lead_paragraph: The organist Kent Tritle deployed one of his many choruses, Musica Sacra, at the Church of St. Paul the Apostle near Columbus Circle.

headline.main: Spare in Vocals, but Robust in Melody
headline.print_headline: Spare in Vocals, but Robust in Melody
headline.seo: Musica Sacra at the Church of St. Paul the Apostle — Review
